description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Tatie Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham & Tatie Cakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g leftover roast potatoes, chopped (see Garlic & oregano hasselback potatoes recipe)
150g leftover leg ham, chopped (see Passionfruit glazed ham recipe)
rocket salad mix (and lemon wedges, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly mash potato. Add ham, onion, herbs, mustard and egg. Season to taste and stir to combine. With damp hands, shape into 12 patties. Lightly coat with flour.
Heat about 2cm oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook patties, in batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel.
Serve patties with salad mix and lemon wedges.
